FactView¶

class mnemosyne.libmnemosyne.fact_view.FactView(name, id)¶

Sequence of fields from a fact to form a question and an answer. A fact view needs an id string as well as a name, because the name can change for different translations.

Note that id’s should be unique, so a good naming convention is ‘card_type_id::fact_view_id’.
